description: Episode of Series "PGR Series". A large number of small children and babies are injured every year in and around the home. These 5 short episodes look at child safety in a practical way. Focuses on issues such as common, easily swallowed poisons, burns, fire-proof clothing, the dangers of electricity, devices which can be installed to prevent electrical accidents, the hazards to be found in the backyard, the safe placement of furniture and fittings in the home, pool safety and rescusitation skills in case of drowning.
